sys_hub_action_type_definition.annotation:
Inputs
attachmentSysId linesToSkip writeBackAsAttachment parentTable parentSysId newFileName Outputs
cleanedCSV cleanedAttachmentSysId
sys_hub_action_type_definition.description: Strips first n number of lines from a CSV attachment and optionally writes to a new file. CleanedCVS string can directly be used for processing in the next flow step
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Strip Lines From CSV Attachment
